CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 5, 1962, pg. A14, reads: "Monte Carlo Hostesses - Some of the young ladies who will serve as hostesses for Monte Carlo Nights at Loendi Club, Thursday, Friday, and Saturday, May 24, 25 and 26. Top: Rose Marie Mitchell. Center (left to right): Day Rene Edwards, Jeanne Hill and Ella Harris. Bottom: Dorothy Fulton, Marlene Stevens and Emma Thompson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of hosts for Monte Carlo party, first row from left: Dorothy Fulton, Marlene Stevens (McEnheimer), Emma Thompson; middle: Day Rene Edwards, Jeanne Hill, Ella Harris; and Rose Marie Mitchell (Payne) at top, posed in Loendi Club
